objects.name: AboutText
objects.string:
Controls:
Use the arrow keys to move your character left and right.

Objective:
Hit falling fruits with your character while avoiding bombs. Each fruit hit earns points, but hitting three bombs results in a game over.

Scoring:
Gain points for every fruit hit; aim for a high score while maintaining a balance to avoid bombs and stay in the game.

events.comment: Move shape according to the game speed
Move obstacle according to the game speed

CREATE PARTICLES
Create the proper one according to the shape that is colliding with the Monster. Give them a proper size too.
Delete the shape that was eaten and update the score
